title: css 好看的案例
content:
渐变

<body>
  <div class="box"><h2>Gradient</h2></div>
  <div class="box"><h2>box</h2></div>
  <div class="box"><h2>Shadow</h2></div>
</body>
body {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  min-height: 100vh;
}
.box {
  position: relative;
  width: 300px;
  height: 200px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  margin: 0 30px;
}
.box::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  filter: blur(25px);
  transform: translateY(30px) scale(0.9);
}
.box:nth-child(1),
.box:nth-child(1)::before {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #f403d1, #64b5f6);
}
.box:nth-child(2),
.box:nth-child(2)::before {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #ffec61, #f321d7);
}
.box:nth-child(3),
.box:nth-child(3)::before {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #24ff72, #2196f3);
}
.box h2 {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  color: #fff;
  font-size: 3em;
}

伪类

<div class="container">
      <div class="ghost">
        <div class="ghostEyes"></div>
        <div class="ghostDimples"></div>
        <div class="ghostFeet">
          <div class="ghostFoot"></div>
          <div class="ghostFoot"></div>
          <div class="ghostFoot"></div>
          <div class="ghostFoot"></div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="shadow"></div>
    </div>
* {
       /* 页面初始化 清除元素的内外边距 */
       padding: 0;
       margin: 0;
     }
     body {
       /* 弹性布局 让元素在页面中垂直+水平居中 */
       display: flex;
       justify-content: center;
       align-items: center;
       /* 让页面占浏览器可视区域的高度 */
       height: 100vh;
       background-color: #00034b;
     }
     .container .ghost {
       /* 相对定位 */
       position: relative;
       width: 150px;
       height: 225px;
       /* 圆角属性 左上角和右上角为圆角 */
       border-radius: 75px 75px 0 0;
       background-color: #fff;
       /* 盒子阴影 inset是内阴影 啥都不加就是默认的外阴影(outset) */
       box-shadow: -17px 0 0 #dbdbdb inset, 0 0 50px #5939db;
       animation: ghost 2s infinite;
     }
     /* 眼睛 start */
     .container .ghost .ghostEyes {
       /* 弹性布局 */
       display: flex;
       /* 让元素平均分配宽度 */
       justify-content: space-around;
       width: 90px;
       padding-top: 70px;
       margin: 0 auto;
     }
     /* 利用两个伪元素做出卡姿兰大眼睛 */
     .container .ghost .ghostEyes::before,
     .container .ghost .ghostEyes::after {
       content: "";
       width: 15px;
       height: 25px;
       border-radius: 50%;
       background-color: #00034b;
     }
     /* 眼睛 end */

     /* 腮红 start  */
     /* 逻辑跟眼睛一样 */
     .container .ghost .ghostDimples {
       display: flex;
       justify-content: space-around;
       width: 130px;
       padding-top: 15px;
       margin: 0 auto;
     }
     .container .ghost .ghostDimples::before,
     .container .ghost .ghostDimples::after {
       content: "";
       width: 15px;
       height: 15px;
       border-radius: 50%;
       background-color: #ffbeff;
     }
     /* 腮红 end */

     /* 脚 start  */
     .container .ghost .ghostFeet {
       /* 这个主要是向让四只脚水平排列  */
       display: flex;
       /* 绝对定位 */
       position: absolute;
       bottom: -13px;
       width: 100%;
     }
     .container .ghost .ghostFeet .ghostFoot {
       width: 25%;
       height: 26px;
       border-radius: 50%;
       background-color: #fff;
     }
     /* 设置一下最后一个 让它跟身体的内阴影一样 */
     .container .ghost .ghostFeet .ghostFoot:last-child {
       /* 利用背景渐变色实现 to right 是从做到右 */
       background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #fff 55%, #dbdbdb 45%);
     }
     /* 脚 end */

     /* 阴影 start */
     .container .shadow {
       width: 150px;
       height: 40px;
       margin-top: 50px;
       border-radius: 50%;
       background-color: #000232;
       /* 动画  名称 时长 infinite是无限次播放 */
       animation: shadow 2s infinite;
     }
     /* 阴影 end */
     /* 然后制作漂浮的动画 */
     @keyframes ghost {
       0%,
       100% {
         transform: translateY(0);
       }
       50% {
         /* 2D位移 -15px 是向上走 */
         transform: translateY(-15px);
       }
     }
     @keyframes shadow {
       0%,
       100% {
         transform: scale(1);
       }
       50% {
         /* 缩放 .9比1小一点点 */
         transform: scale(0.9);
       }
     }

半透明边框

.box {
        border: 10px solid hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.5);
        background: white;
        background-clip: padding-box; // 定义了背景裁剪
        width: 100px;
        height: 100px;
      }

多边框

.box {
        margin: 40px;
        border: 10px solid hsla(0, 0%, 100%, 0.5);
        background: white;
        box-shadow: 0 0 0 10px #655,
                    0 0 0 15px deeppink,
                    0 2px 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, .6);
        width: 100px;
        height: 100px;
      }

条纹

.box {
        margin: 40px;
        height: 90px;
        width: 90px;
        /* background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #fb3 33.3%, #58a 0);
        background-size: 30px 30px; */
        background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(
          45deg,
          #fb3,
          #fb3 15px,
          #58a 0,
          #58a 30px
        );
      }

条纹2

.box {
        margin: 40px;
        height: 300px;
        width: 300px;
        /* background-image: linear-gradient(45deg, #fb3 33.3%, #58a 0);
        background-size: 30px 30px; */
        background: #eee;
        background-image: linear-gradient(
            rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 25%,
            transparent 0,
            transparent 75%,
            rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 0
          ),
          linear-gradient(
            90deg,
            transparent 25%,
            rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 0,
            rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25) 75%,
            transparent 0
          );
        background-position: 0 0 15px 15px;
        background-size: 30px 30px;
      }

网格背景

.square {
      width: 100%;
      height: 100vh;
      background-color: #fff;
      background-image: linear-gradient(
          45deg,
          #eee 25%,
          transparent 25%,
          transparent 75%,
          #eee 75%
        ),
        linear-gradient(
          45deg,
          #eee 25%,
          transparent 25%,
          transparent 75%,
          #eee 75%
        );
      background-size: 16px 16px;
      background-position: 0 0, 8px 8px;
    }

镂空

.clip-shape {
    width: 150px;
    height: 150px;
    outline: 999px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    position: absolute;
    left: 0;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    margin: auto;
    cursor: move;
  }

.circle-shape {
      width: 200px;
      height: 100px;
      position: absolute;
      left: 0;
      bottom: 0;
      right: 0;
      top: 0;
      margin: auto;
      border-radius: 50%;
      box-shadow: 0 0 0 9999px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);
    }
